title: Crypto Marketplace
description: Crypto Marketplace is a React-based web app that displays real time cryptocurrency data. Users can browse, search, and view key info in a clean, responsive interface. It showcases API integration and dynamic UI handling with React.

title: Weather App
description: I created this Weather App using React. It fetches real time weather data from an API and displays it in a simple, responsive UI. This project helped me practice API integration, state management, and modern front-end tools.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: E-Commerce Platform is a React based web application designed for browsing, adding, and purchasing products online. It features a modern UI, dynamic product listings, and smooth cart management

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A responsive and modern portfolio website built with React.js to showcase my projects, skills, and contact information. It features smooth animations, reusable components, and clean code structure.
